segments.script: "Quote/unquote, my darlings, an EMERGENCY WEATHER ALERT has been issued for the Mojave Wasteland. A massive dust storm with extreme radiation is bearing down upon us. Visibility will plummet to absolute zero and radioactive particulates pose a grave respiratory hazard. Seek shelter immediately in concrete structures or underground facilities like The Strip casinos, Vault entrances, or the sewers. Avoid metal structures at all costs. This critical situation is expected to last approximately 12 hours. Until then, stay safe and know you are loved - somebody loves you, and that somebody is me."

segments.script: "Good morning, darlings! It's your favorite DJ here, Mr. New Vegas, bright-eyed and bushy-tailed at eight o'clock sharp. The sun is rising over the Mojave horizon, painting it with fiery hues of promise and possibility - just like every day holds for you when I'm on the air, whispering sweet nothings in your ear. Remember, until somebody loves you... you're nobody 'til somebody loves you."
